title: Analog Chess
dot: digraph AnalogChess{subgraph cluster_game{label="Analog Chess";subgraph cluster_rules{label="Rules";"No check or checkmate"->"Win by capturing opponent's king";}subgraph cluster_pieces{label="Pieces";"Pawn"->"0-2 squares on first move, 0-1 otherwise, attack diagonally";"Bishop"->"Moves any distance diagonally";"Knight"->"Moves in a circle of radius sqrt(5)";"Rook"->"Moves any distance orthogonally";"Queen"->"Moves any distance orthogonally or diagonally";"King"->"Moves 0-1 squares orthogonally or 0-sqrt(2) squares diagonally, can castle";}subgraph cluster_capturing{label="Capturing";"Overlap opponent's piece to capture"->"Can't move past first piece overlapped";"Can capture multiple pieces at once";}}subgraph cluster_code{label="Code";"Install Python and PyGame"->"Run latest.py file";}}
